meanings.definition: Female students at a coeducational institution.
meanings.sent1: The coeds gathered in the library to study for their exams.
meanings.sent2: The coeds walked together to their next class.
meanings.sent3: The coeds decided to start a book club to share their love for reading.
meanings.sent4: The coeds were like a bouquet of diverse flowers, each bringing something unique to the group.
meanings.sent5: The image of the coeds laughing under the tree will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A group of female students attending a coeducational institution.
meanings.sent1: During lunchtime, the coeds sat together in the cafeteria.
meanings.sent2: The coeds participated in various extracurricular activities.
meanings.sent3: The coeds organized a bake sale to raise funds for charity.
meanings.sent4: The coeds were a flock of birds, always moving together in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The coeds' enthusiasm for learning was contagious among their peers.
